casebody.data:
DEWEY SCHMOLL, SUCCESSOR ASSIGNEE FOR THE BENEFIT OF CREDITORS OF MURCH BROTHERS CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC., AND NATIONAL SURETY CORPORATION, v. THE UNITED STATES [Nos. 44761, 44762, 44763, 44764, 44765, 44766, 44767, 44768, 44769, 44770, 44999] [105 C. Cls. 415;

329 U. S — ]

Government contracts for construction and remodeling of post office buildings; rights of surety; rental of temporary *710quarters; defective pleading; deductions for taxes due by contractor, etc.

Plaintiffs’ petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 14, 1946.
